Package org.eclipse.graphiti.ui.internal.util.draw2d

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GFColorConstants  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChopboxAnchorFixed
    The purpose of this class is to fix bugs in the ChopboxAnchor by overwriting the erroneous methods.
    GFBendpointHandle
    A circular handle which is placed on a bendpoint of a connection.
    GFChopboxAnchor
    A chopbox anchor supporting insets
    GFConnectionEndpointHandle  
    GFCornerHandle
    A rectangular handle which is placed at a corner or at a side of a shape edit-part.
    GFHandleHelper
    Collection of static helper methods for handles.
    GFSurroundingHandle
    A rectangular handle, which completely surrounds the owner edit-part.
    GridLayer  
    LineSeg  
    LineSeg.KeyPoint
    Enumeration class for defining the keypoint along a line segment.
    LineSeg.Sign
    Enumeration class for defining the orientations of a point relative to the line segment.
    LineSeg.TrigValues
    Structure to hold onto trig values that represent an angle
    Tooltip  
    TransparentGhostFigure  
    ZoomingInsetsHandleLocator
    A Locator, which sets the target bounds to the reference figure bounds.
    ZoomingRelativeHandleLocator
    A Locator, which sets the target bounds depending on the reference figure bounds according to the following rules: The handle-insets are used to expand/shrink the reference figure bounds, at the beginning of the calculation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GFBendpointHandle.Type
    Enumeration of the supported types of the bendpoint handle (create/move).
